properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Baldwin, GA; Wilkinson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 2:48PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Montgomery...Treutlen and
Wheeler Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Milledgeville.
* Until further notice.
* At 2 PM Wednesday the stage was 31.4 feet...and steady.
* Minor flooding will continue.
* Flood stage is 22 feet.
* The river is expected to fall to near 26.5 feet this afternoon,
then continue to fall to a stage of 24 feet by Friday afternoon.
The river will remain around 24 feet through the weekend.
* At 32 feet...Moderate flooding begins and expands further into
the woodlands and pastures along the river. Fishing Creek continues
to back up and spread further into woodland areas and covers some
roads in low lying areas. Tanyard Branch Stream continues to flood.
Sinclair Dam will likely have five gates open to reach this height.
